pkgmetadata.longdescription: Cancer RADAR Project Tool // Cancer RADAR is a project which aim is to develop an infrastructure that allows quantifying the risk of cancer by migration background across Europe. This package contains a set of functions cancer registries partners should use to reshape 5 year-age group cancer incidence data into a set of summary statistics (see Boyle Parkin (1991, ISBN:978-92-832-1195-2)) in lines with Cancer RADAR data protections rules.
